s: Bézier Games designs richly thematic board games for friends and families so they can create unforgettable memories. We call our games "The New Classics" because people play them so often, our games aren't see as a hobby but as a tradition.

Bezier Games publishes fun strategic and party games that are richly themed, always different, and accessible to everyone. Maglev Metro, One Night Ultimate Werewolf, Suburbia, Castles of Mad King Ludwig, Whistle Mountain and the 2019 Spiel des Jahres Nominee, Werewords are just a few of our titles.
